Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute near Division/Kostner
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses temp. rerouted WB: Division, Kostner, Chicago Ave., Cicero, and Division; EB: Division, Cicero, Chicago Ave., Kostner and Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Division/Kostner, due to street blockage near Division/Kostner.

Westbound buses will operate via Division, Kostner, Chicago Avenue, Cicero, Division and over regular route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Division, Cicero, Chicago Avenue, Kostner, Division and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Grand/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Eastbound 65 Grand buses are temp. rerouted via Grand, Pulaski, Division, then resume their normal route on Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Pulaski, Division, then resume their normal route on Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Rockwell
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temp. rerouted via 63rd, Western 59th, California, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to street blockage nr 63rd/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Western 59th, California, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Rockwell.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Harlem (O'Hare Blue Line Branch) and Addison
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem (O'Hare Blue Line Branch) and Addison due to loss of power near Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem (O'Hare Blue Line Branch) and Addison due to loss of power near Harlem.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Harlem (O'Hare Blue Line Branch), and,
  • between Addison and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Harlem (O'Hare Blue Line Branch) and Addison to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
